DOC.criteria: Male female patient 50 85 year age Clinically proven Fuchs corneal dystrophy secondary decompensation corneal endothelium ( e. g. surgical intervention anterior segment eye ) Patient inform consent Previous penetrate keratoplasty Corneal neovascularisation Pathologic change anterior segment eye ( anterior / posterior synechiae , uveitis ) Glaucoma Aphakia Infectious diseases cornea Neurodermitis Participation patient another clinical trial within last four week precede recruitment The patient unlikely comply requirement protocol Previous current abuse medication , narcotic alcohol Pregnancy
